title: India has potential to produce lithium-ion batteries, Kashmir has 6% of global lithium stock: Nitin Gadkari
description: Union Road Transport and Highways Minister Nitin Gadkari announced that Jammu and Kashmir holds 6% of the world's lithium stock, highlighting India's potential to produce lithium-ion batteries. He emphasised the future of electric vehicles and the need for alternate fuels like ethanol and hydrogen. Gadkari also discussed India's growing automobile industry and its significant export contributions.
